title: Marine, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 15(4) of the SeaFisheries (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 2 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited sea-fisheries (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: Marine, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 15(4) of the SeaFisheries (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 2 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: 2. The 3rd day of May 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Sea
text_raw:
2. The 3rd day of May 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Sea 
Fisheries (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 2 of 2022) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 April, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th April, 2022.
